entities.name: slytherin

entities.name: slughorn

relationships.description: Voldemort is described as Slytherin's heir, indicating that he has inherited or taken over the house.
Voldemort is mentioned as creating Horcruxes, which are objects that contain pieces of his soul.
Dumbledore is described as advising Harry, indicating that he is providing guidance or counsel to the young wizard.
